citation.article-title: Proposal of Frondihabitans gen. nov. to replace the illegitimate genus name Frondicola Zhang et al. 2007
citation.source: International Journal of Systematic and Evolutionary Microbiology

p.s: Description of Frondihabitans australicus (Zhang et al. 2007) comb. nov.
Frondihabitans australicus (aus.tra′li.cus. N.L. masc. adj. australicus pertaining to Australia).
Illegitimate homotypic synonym: Frondicola australicus Zhang et al. 2007.
The description of the species is as given for Frondicola australicus by Zhang et al. (2007).
The species also has the features listed under the genus description, which differ in detail from those published previously by Zhang et al. (2007).
The GenBank accession number for the 16S rRNA gene sequence of strain E1HC-02T is DQ525859 (not DQ52589 as given by Zhang et al., 2007).
The introductory part of this text is based on an earlier publication of Tindall & Euzéby (2006).
